interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Sinful Colors Finger Nail Polish Color Lacquer Set 10-Piece Collection (Shine)
Review Date: 2017/03/15
Store: Beauty Brags
Average Rating: 3.8
Product Details: {'Brand': 'Beauty Brags', 'Item Form': 'Liquid', 'Finish Type': 'Shimmery', 'Material Feature': 'Non-Toxic, Cruelty Free', 'Age Range (Description)': 'adult,teen', 'Unit Count': '5 Fl Oz', 'Number of Items': '10', 'Item Dimensions LxWxH': '6 x 2.5 x 3.5 inches', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '6 x 2.5 x 3.5 inches; 1.25 Pounds', 'UPC': '709872667402'}
Review Text: What a great value! I received shades from the recent Sinful Porcelain Matte collection (2016) and Carded collection (2016). I haven't tried all of them yet but I did inspect the bottles and none of them looked used. There was no spillage or leakage during transit and the consistency was as expected from Sinful np. Not all of the shades are to my taste but my daughter was happy to received the ones I didn't want. I ended up keeping about 8 of them for myself. Nice collection and I'm glad I purchased!

reference_summary:
SKEDERM EXHYDRO Ceramide Complex Moisturizer, Intensive Repair and Hydration Daily Face Cream, 50ml BBInfinite {'Brand': 'BBInfinite', 'Item Form': 'Cream', 'Unit Count': '1.7 Fl Oz', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Use for': 'Face', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '1.77 x 2.17 x 3.74 inches; 2.08 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'SKSF004-050'} The Skederm ExHydro Ceramide Complex Moisturizer is great for facial skin that needs moisture but not necessarily a heavy duty cream. I found the consistency to be light and silky and almost undetectable on my skin after it absorbed. My skin just felt hydrated and bouncier. For my dry skin, I usually like more emollient creams for night time use. I found this cream perfect for daytime worn under an SPF cream and foundation or a BB cream. I use it in place of a serum and it acts like a makeup primer, blurring lines and pores and making skin appear smoother while adding a dose of hydration. Not a lot is needed. I use four small dots to cover my entire face. From what I can tell it is also color and fragrance free.

The key ingredient that attracted me to this product is the Ceramide Complex consisting of Ceramides I, III, VI and natural ingredients (palm oil, algae extract, and fig extracts) that act to hydrate and firm skin. The Skederm ExHydro Ceramide Complex Moisturizer also has glycerin and silicone derivatives in it to increase water retention and give your skin a silky feel. I love that it is supplied in a tube. It's not fancy, but it is very convenient and hygienic. This Skederm product is made in Korea which has been at the forefront of cosmetics and skincare research in recent years. The Skederm ExHydro Ceramide Complex Moisturizer is great for facial skin that needs moisture but not necessarily ... Myconos Magic BB CC Moist Air Cushion Compact Korean Cover Foundation SPF50+ with 1 Extra Refill Luminous Glow Shade 21 {'Item Form': 'Cream', 'Unit Count': '1.0 Count', 'Number of Items': '2', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Sun Protection': '50 SPF', 'Package Dimensions': '3.31 x 3.11 x 2.6 inches; 4.8 Ounces', 'UPC': '789655125510 763109545659'} Wow! What a luxurious, well-made cushion compact. This rivals the high-end one I purchased from Lancome a few months ago. The product came boxed with the ingredients listed. You're also getting a sealed refill cushion compact included in the box which is amazing for the price. The compact is made of a high quality white plastic. It's easy to open using a push button in the front. There's a good size mirror in the upper lid and a hinged plastic cover to prevent the cushion from drying out. You can hear a soft click when it's closed, so you know it's not going to open inadvertently. There's a Myconos branded applicator that rests on top of the cover.

The foundation I got (#2) works well with my NC20-25 skin. It's not a heavy foundation. I would consider it moderate coverage at best. It's very blendable and like most cushion compacts, feels very light on the skin. I included a picture which shows a heavy application on my cheek blended out towards the front of my face. Wear is very good. I haven't felt the need to reapply after using it in the morning. Like a lot of Korean cosmetics, the quality and cutting edge technology used is amazing. This is a fantastic deal especially since a refill was included. Gorgeous Korean made cushion compact plus refill. NuPeptin Calming Facial Scrub exfoliating scrub that cleanses and immediately helps to give your skin a smoother and softer appearance. Nupeptin {'Package Dimensions': '6 x 2 x 0.3 inches; 3.2 Ounces', 'UPC': '727510007168', 'Manufacturer': 'Supportiback'} This is a really nicely balanced facial scrub. There are plenty of exfoliating beads so you actually feel like you are scrubbing your skin. However, they are contained in an emollient base with Jojoba oil, sunflower seed oil, and vitamin E so that it doesn't feel very harsh at all. I did not detect much of a scent and the overall experience was calming yet effective. After rinsing, I felt my skin was prepared to receive skincare product. A little goes a long way. Highly recommend. This is a really nicely balanced facial scrub Evarne Refining Jojoba Face Wash Cleanser For Even Complexion - Paraben Free, Sulfate Free. Exfoliate, Brighten, Hydrate, Refresh, Purify Evarne {'Item Form': 'Cream', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Brand': 'Evarne', 'Scent': 'Grapefruit, Aloe Vera', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '1.5 x 7.5 x 1.5 inches; 6.4 Ounces', 'UPC': '684334566342'} I love this cleanser! It cleans gently yet effectively without any harsh detergents. It does contain both physical and chemical exfoliators in the form of jojoba beads and AHAs (glycolic, malic and lactic acids) and BHAs (salicylic acid). The jojoba beads feel like tiny little balls which eventually melt into the cleanser as you massage it onto your face. As they break down, they provide moisture to the skin along with the aloe and the glycerin in the formulation. It's important to use both physical and chemical exfoliation to get rid of dead skin cells and clean pores and it's nice to have both in one preparation.

I use it to clean my skin after makeup removal. I wet my face and use a quarter size amount and massage onto my face for about a minute. You can feel the beads start to get smaller/less numerous as you massage. I leave this on my face for another 1-2 minutes to allow the AHAs and BHAs to do their work, then rinse well with water. Skin feels very clean but not dry or stripped of natural oils. It has a pleasant, light citrus scent and the packaging it simple, yet elegant. Very happy I found this! I love this cleanser Bamboo Serum by Elements of Beauty (1 oz) - Skin Firming Treatment Helps Tighten Sagging Skin - Anti-Wrinkle Serum Locks in Moisture - With Vitamin C, CoQ10 and Coconut Elements of Beauty {'Skin Type': 'Dry', 'Product Benefits': 'Hydrating', 'Use for': 'Face', 'Scent': 'Coconut', 'Brand': 'Elements of Beauty', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '5.1 x 4.65 x 1.6 inches; 3.6 Ounces', 'UPC': '712038006632'} My bottle came with a dropper instead of the pump as shown in the listing (not sure if the dropper is new or old packaging). This is a slightly viscous, cloudy serum that I put on clean, dry skin. As it absorbs, you can fell a slight tightening effect on your face. It's subtle but noticeable. I compare it to putting stockings on your legs. It just feels like things are being held in. I didn't notice any major wrinkles disappearing, but the lifting effect was pleasant. I had no problem applying moisturizers/makeup on top. There was no flaking or pilling and application of my makeup was smooth.

I appreciate the inclusions of ingredients like Vitamin E, CoQ10, and Vitamin C. All of these are great for the skin and I Iike using them in my serums. I assume it's the bamboo extract that gives the tightening/lifting effect. Bamboo extract is very high in naturally occurring silica which helps build collagen and helps your body hold onto calcium which is suppose to result in a more elastic skin tone. I didn't find this serum particularly moisturizing, but my skin is dry and as mentioned, I can use moisturizer on top without any issues. Really nice serum and different from a lot of other things currently on the market. Glad I tried it! It just feels like things are being held in Sinful Colors Finger Nail Polish Color Lacquer Set 10-Piece Collection (Shine) Beauty Brags {'Brand': 'Beauty Brags', 'Item Form': 'Liquid', 'Finish Type': 'Shimmery', 'Material Feature': 'Non-Toxic, Cruelty Free', 'Age Range (Description)': 'adult,teen', 'Unit Count': '5 Fl Oz', 'Number of Items': '10', 'Item Dimensions LxWxH': '6 x 2.5 x 3.5 inches', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '6 x 2.5 x 3.5 inches; 1.25 Pounds', 'UPC': '709872667402'} What a great value! profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

- **Skin Type Preference:** Prefers lightweight moisturizers ideal for dry skin, especially suitable for daytime use.
- **Product Features:** Enjoys products with a silky, undetectable consistency upon absorption, hydrating and smoothing skin while also being effective as makeup primers. Recently discovered a love for cleansers that combine physical and chemical exfoliation. Appreciates serums providing subtle tightening effects for smooth makeup application without pilling or flaking.
- **Preferred Ingredients:** Attracted to ceramides and natural ingredients for hydration and skin firmness, with interest in glycerin, silicone derivatives, and soothing emollient bases like jojoba and sunflower seed oil. Values exfoliating acids, Vitamin C, and CoQ10 in formulations.
- **Usage Preference:** Favors cream-based multifunctional products as standalone moisturizers or under makeup, alongside effective cleansing routines post-makeup removal.
- **Packaging Preference:** Values hygienic, convenient packaging, favoring tube formats over jars, and appreciates well-designed compacts with refill options.
- **Brand Inclination:** Shows a preference for Korean products, recognizing their innovation in cosmetics and skincare.
- **Scent Sensitivity:** Prefers fragrance-free products but enjoys light coconut and citrus scents in cleansers, seeking irritation-free formulations.
- **Review Behavior:** Tends to give high ratings for products that meet specific skincare needs effectively. Recently demonstrated an appreciation for value in beauty products, including color cosmetics, while engaging in family-oriented gifting. Valuing both effectiveness and quality, they prioritize innovative formulations in their skincare and cosmetic choices.
